pr_title: [KOGITO-4076] Monitoring addon is broken with SpringBoot

timeline.message: Fixed DecisionRestResourceGenerator template + Made DecisionCodegenTest parametric to test all env + Updated monitoring-springboot-addon to only use Spring Web

timeline.bodyText: This has been probably done due to jUnit parameterized tests output so it is easier to spot which parameter is currently being tested. I haven't seen the exact output, but having just plain Java in the output of the Java program might cause some confusion/overlooking. Wouldn't it be better to define it for example JavaKogitoBuildContextBuilder or KogitoBuildContextBuilder - Java etc?
timeline.author: MarianMacik

replies.bodyText: A similar change is done (with a proper context name) in this other PR
replies.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: Probably there it is fine, but if here the purpose is for jUnit parametrization, I would add there also at least info that it is a builder and not the context maybe? As otherwise both the context and its builder will have just Java. But up to you, it was just a point to discuss.
replies.author: MarianMacik

timeline.message:
